Class MixSpecies

java.lang.Object
heparansulfate.MixSpecies
public class MixSpecies extends Object
Enumeration of sequences (species) with a specified chain length distribution. The model of the chain length distribution is obtained by projection.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    MixSpecies(int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu)
    Mixture model of BKHS chain lengths and sequence enumeration.

  • Constructor Details

    • MixSpecies

      public MixSpecies(int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu)
      Mixture model of BKHS chain lengths and sequence enumeration.
      Parameters:
      lmin - Smallest chain length.
      lmax - Largest chain length.
      sigma - Spread (standard deviation) of chain lengths.
      mu - Average chain length.

  • Method Details

    • testRhoLHomFeas

      public static void testRhoLHomFeas(String inDir)
      Tests that homogeneity of composition across chain lengths is feasible after incorporating digest constraints.

      Note: Requires large memory (e.g., -Xmx8000M).

      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory.

    • getW

      public static double[] getW(int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu)
      Computes the chain length distribution. A Gaussian (mu, sigma) restricted between lmin and lmax is used as an approximation, followed by projection on the probability simplex to preserve mu.
      Parameters:
      lmin - Smallest chain length.
      lmax - Longest chain length.
      sigma - Standard deviation of Gaussian approximation.
      mu - Desired average chain length.
      Returns:
      Chain length distribution between lmin and lmax with mean mu.

    • saveFullDistribution

      public void saveFullDistribution(int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu, String filePath)
      Saves a distribution of chain lengths to a file.
      Parameters:
      lmin - Smallest length.
      lmax - Largest length.
      sigma - Spread parameter.
      mu - Mean length.
      filePath - Path to the output file.

    • saveDistribution

      public static void saveDistribution(int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu, String filePath)
      Static wrapper to compute and save chain length distribution.
      Parameters:
      lmin - Smallest length.
      lmax - Largest length.
      sigma - Spread parameter.
      mu - Mean length.
      filePath - Path to the output file.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main entry point for testing feasibility.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments.
